bike.description: Hi-Tensile steel frame, sloping design, rack/fender mounts, forged dropouts with double eyelets
bike.paint_description: M: Sangria or Winter Blue F: Sangria or Sage

components.description: Hi-tensile steel unicrown, radiused blades, double dropout eyelets
Alex R-1000 alloy rims, 36H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
CST Marathon/Tour with silver safety stripe, 700 x 32c
Forged alloy crank, single 44T chainring, 170mm, with full length chainguard
Comfort platform with TPE non-slip insert
Jamis ARC, 6061 aluminum, 25.4 x 27JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 580mm
Jamis alloy hi-rise, quill type, 35JAMIS_DEGREE x 80mm with 180mm quill
Anatomic double density kraton grip with end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 25.4 x 350mm with alloy clamp and QR seatpinin
Jamis Metro Sport with synthetic suede cover, burnished sides and bumper springs with satin steel rails, gender specific
